response.original_title: SLASH S.E.R.P.E.N.T. Festival : Live from Denver
response.overview: Join Slash live from the Mission Ballroom as the inaugural S.E.R.P.E.N.T Festival, Slashâ€™s blues tour that accompanies the release of his latest blues album Orgy Of The Damned.  Experience the soulful melodies and electrifying performances that define the blues, all while contributing to a greater cause.  Join us for an unforgettable celebration of music and purpose at the S.E.R.P.E.N.T Festival.
response.title: SLASH S.E.R.P.E.N.T. Festival : Live from Denver
